mapper.select: select del.deliv_id AS deliv_id , del.regdate AS regdate , user.client AS client , pcin.pur_cnt AS pur_cnt from tb_userinfo user join tb_purchaseinfo pcin on user.loginID = pcin.loginID join tb_delivdir del on del.purinf_id = pcin.purinf_id order by del.deliv_id desc LIMIT #{pageIndex}, #{pageSize}
select COUNT(deliv_id) from tb_userinfo user join tb_purchaseinfo pcin on user.loginID = pcin.loginID join tb_delivdir del on del.purinf_id = pcin.purinf_id

select del.regdate AS regdate , user.client AS client , sal.sales_nm AS sales_nm , pcin.pur_cnt AS pur_cnt , pc.depositYN AS depositYN
from tb_userinfo user join tb_purchase pc on pc.loginID = user.loginID join tb_purchaseinfo pcin on pc.loginID = pcin.loginID join tb_delivdir del on del.purinf_id = pcin.purinf_id join tb_sales sal ON sal.sales_id = pcin.sales_id where del.deliv_id = #{deliv_id}
